extendedInfo.description: This app provides quick access to system settings via a single configurable view. Since 2009 this app has been saving time to millions of its users. Now we have new apps for you.For adding settings to the status bar try Settings Extended: http://goo.gl/QfjEMFor Android 4.0 and higher try Quicker: http://goo.gl/DHg7mOut G+ community: http://goo.gl/QGiMgRestrictions:* LED flashlight might not work on some phones* GPS (since Android 2.3) and Mobile Data (since Android 2.3.3) are only shortcuts* Switched off 3G and 4G connections can automatically reopen after reboot or going back form airplane mode.* Mobile Data (APN) switch might not work (or may even break your Internet settings) while working with APN of some mobile network operators. Use it on your own risk. Not supported since Android 4.0 due to security restriction.* 4G is for HTC phones only.* Status bar shortcuts stay there if QS installed in PHONE memory only.This app advertises Quicker and Settings Extended apps ones a week.Permissions explanation:* Take pictures and videos - LED flashlight as a part of camera* Network communication - Bluetooth & Wi-Fi controls* Your location - GPS control on pre-2.3 system* You accounts - Auto-Sync control

reviews.title: Just needs a little work...
reviews.comment: Works great overall. Used this app on two former android phones...an original Moto Droid and a Moto Droid X2. Worked great on both. On my RAZR Max HD, the data bar reads memory available for phone and SD card as only phone. Unmounted and remounted card with same result. Other than that just shy of 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ross Trimboli

reviews.title: Very easy and helpful
reviews.comment: This app has been usefull for the last 3yrs. I put this on my new Samsung s3 I also had it on my previous phone which was an LG I believe they don\'t have this app anymore the new version is a paid version only. WHY??
reviews.author: Tomas P

reviews.title: Usefull
reviews.comment: I found this one very usefull You can cntrol each setting from the hme screen. It includes a torch too
reviews.author: lijo cherian

reviews.title: Not working well....
reviews.comment: The wifi hotspot line makes the settings app crash each time I want to cinfigure it. Also, the mobile data switch and the GPS switch are not working. Discontinued?  Icon hiding doesn\'t work either... you just see a gap between other icons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome little tool.
reviews.comment: Goes above and beyond the normal toggle switch apps. Useful features in am easy, simple interface - couldn\'t ask for more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s not working
reviews.comment: Its saying my network is a problem. I thought it\'ll be easy
reviews.author: Erica Broadway

reviews.title: Mem usage inaccurate on S4
reviews.comment: The size and free memory for the card always shows the same as internal memory although my sdcard is 32gb and internal mem is 16gb. Works ok on S3
reviews.author: Kable Singh

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: This is a good app all tho do not turn on mobile hotspot you will get error code 37 if you get error code 67 hit dismiss or update profile and if you have the sprint LG OPTIMUS it should work but with the virgin mobile LG OPTIMUS itll make you have to call your virgin mobile carrier and factory data reset your phone (all info stord on phone will be deleted) but another words this app is good ive tried it on other devices and its good but on the LG op. Contact me to get 3g back email is rino60985@gmail.com

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: nice app.. simple nd clever

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Don\'t know what everyone is ranting about this being a good app , rubbish... Phone settings are more detailed and a lot better ........

reviews.comment: Is this the app that provides free portable wifi without using my data? (I have galaxy note 2)

reviews.title: Best utility app
reviews.comment: Been using these guys since 2011, it gets the job done with a clean GUI.

reviews.title: Used to work.
reviews.comment: But no longer on my Optimus V. Virgin Mobile block. But it did work great. 5 stars.
reviews.author: Rammer Jammer

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Only one that can turn on/off GPRS. Plus all important switches on one screen. Only thing missing is quick access widget with status of switches :-)
reviews.author: Pawel Klopot

reviews.title: You Gotta Have It
reviews.comment: I can\'t live without this! Quick access to turn on/off Wi-Fi, Internet, Bluetooth, Volume settings, Flashlight, etc.  I\'ve used this for years. Love it!
reviews.author: Todd Gustafson

reviews.title: Works good only in smaller screens
reviews.comment: This app has been the best before when the phone screens and resolution was lower. Now when i use it in my Nexus7 or Xperia Z tablet it looks really bad. Please make a version that is suitable for larger screens than 5. Thanks.
